entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:31 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
